original_title: Pete and Dud On The Set of Bedazzled | The Archivist Presents
overview: (21 Aug 1967) Movietone visits Peter Cook and Dudley Moore on location for the Twentieth Century Fox production "Bedazzled". Dud tries to interview the Devil disguised as Peter Cook.
title: Pete and Dud On The Set of Bedazzled | The Archivist Presents
